description: Custom designed for your precious Google Nexus 7 Android 4.1 Jelly Bean tablet, this case features a combination of functionality and style. Well built to protect your Google Nexus 7 for the years to come.Wake or put your device to sleep by opening or closing the case.The premium quality PU leather boosts a classy look.Premium quality no-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection.Built-in stand with multiple angles: perfect whenever you type an email or watch a movie.Interior hand strap for comfortable one-handed use.Access to all features and controls.Padded front cover and plastic hardback offer enhanced protection, at front, back, and all CORNERS.Stylus loop.This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products with LIFETIME WARRANTY and superb customer service.
title: MoKo Slim-fit Cover for Google Nexus 7 Android Tablet, Orange
